title: American Red Cross
description: American Red Cross brand features a diverse palette ranging from classic neutrals like 'FFFFFF' (white) and '000000' (black) to vibrant hues such as 'ED1B2E' (red - a signature color representing urgency and assistance). The colors combine to convey reliability, safety, and vitality. The source of this color information is the official Brand Poster from the American Red Cross, as provided in the PDF from the organization's website.
